name: SJCAM SJ4000 Dual Screen Full HD WiFi Waterproof Sports Action Camera
description: The SJCAM SJ4000 Dual Screen Full HD WiFi Waterproof Sports Action Camera is a versatile and durable camera designed for adventure enthusiasts. With its 170° ultra-wide angle lens and 16MP camera, it allows you to capture stunning photos and videos in Full HD quality. Whether you're hiking, biking, surfing, or engaging in any other thrilling activity, this action camera is built to accompany you every step of the way. The SJCAM SJ4000 is a dual-screen design. It features a 2.0" high-definition main screen on the back and a 1.3" front screen, enabling you to easily frame your shots and preview your footage while you're on the move. This dual-screen setup is particularly beneficial for capturing self-portraits or group shots, as it allows you to see exactly what's being captured in real-time. Thanks to its WiFi compatibility, you can connect the camera to your smartphone or tablet and remotely control it from a distance of up to 10 meters. This feature comes in handy when you want to position the camera in hard-to-reach places or capture shots from unique angles. You can also conveniently transfer your photos and videos wirelessly to your mobile device for instant sharing with friends and family. The SJCAM SJ4000 is built to withstand the elements. It comes with durable waterproof housing that enables you to take the camera underwater to depths of up to 30 meters. Whether you're snorkeling, diving, or simply enjoying a day at the beach, this camera allows you to capture the mesmerizing underwater world with ease. The SJCAM SJ4000 Dual Screen Full HD WiFi Waterproof Sports Action Camera is a reliable and feature-packed device for capturing your adventures. With its dual screens, wide-angle lens, WiFi connectivity, and waterproof housing, it empowers you to unleash your creativity and document your thrilling experiences in stunning detail.

name: SJCAM SJ4000 Air Full Hd Wi-Fi Waterproof Sports Action Camera
description: The SJCAM SJ4000 Air has full HD resolution recording at 1920x1080. Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) allows you to Capture warm and vivid Picturesque scenes with the SJ4000. It detects motion to make your movie clips sharp and exciting. The SJ4000 Air focuses on image quality and affordability. Although not waterproof out of the box, it comes with a 98' waterproof housing, which is also used to attach the camera to one of the several mounts included, such as the helmet mount. One of the recording resolutions is 720p at up to a high frame rate of 120 fps for achieving professional-like slow motion in editing. It features a built-in mic and speaker, a microSD card slot for recording, and built-in Wi-Fi for connecting to the companion iOS/Android SJCAM app. The mobile app allows you to control select functions of the camera remotely as well as set up time-lapse sessions and use other creative tools. This action camera has a removable battery that runs approximately 70 minutes when recording Full HD 1080p video. The battery is rechargeable by connecting the camera to a USB power source using an included cable. The USB port is also used for offloading your photos and videos to your computer for storage, editing, and sharing. The SJCAM SJ4000 Air has no warranty.

name: SJCAM SJ6 Legend 16MP 4K Wi-Fi Waterproof Touch Screen Sports Action Camera
description: The SJCAM SJ6 Legend features a waterproof case, gyro stabilization, and 4K resolution to capture sharp, high-quality footage no matter what the scene. It can record MOV/MP4 H.264 video at a maximum resolution of 2880 x 2160p at 24 fps and takes 16MP JPEG photos at a maximum resolution of 4608 x 3456. It has a 166Â° wide-angle lens that facilitates quick focus and captures a large field of view. It features a Panasonic MN34120PA CMOS sensor with a Novatek 96660 chipset. It comes with a 2" LCD rear touchscreen that provides access to settings such as distortion correction, metering, 180Â° rotation, exposure time, adjustable FOV, loop recording, double file, raw photos, GYRO, EV, color, and white balance, each allowing you to fine-tune your shots. It also has a front LCD with basic information like timecode, resolution, battery level, and record mode. The SJ6 comes with multiple mounting options, bases, and plates for optimal placement flexibility, as well as a waterproof back housing door and a touchscreen door for non-waterproof access during your shoot. The SJCAM SJ6 Legend comes with no warranty.

name: SJCAM SJ6 Pro 24MP 4K Wi-Fi Dual Screen Waterproof Sports Action Camera
description: The SJCAM SJ6 Pro 4K Action Camera can record sharp, high-quality video in any environment thanks to its 98' waterproof shell, 6-axis gyro stabilization, and up to 4K60 resolution. The speaker and microphone are built into the thin plastic body, which barely weighs a few ounces. Additionally, it is capable of recording slow-motion video at up to 1080p120 resolution. The SJ6 Pro captures 24MP JPEG images and MOV/MP4 H.264 video at a maximum quality of 4K60. Its 165 degree wide-angle lens allows for quick focusing and captures a big field of view. In addition to having settings for timer, car, continuous shooting, and interval modes, the camera also has settings for loop recording, time-lapse, vertical screen, video+photo, and fast motion. To set up and operate the camera, it has a 2" back touchscreen and a 1.3" front LCD screen. With a full charge, the mini-USB-chargeable 1000mAh battery operates for around two hours. Due to its detachability, you can buy a replacement to use for longer shoots and charge with a different battery charger that is sold separately. The device features Wi-Fi, and an extra wireless remote control that can be purchased separately can be used to start and pause videos, take multiple photos in succession, turn on and off Wi-Fi, and turn on and off the camera. Additionally, the free SJCAM Zone software lets you edit and share your images and videos while operating the camera from your iOS or Android smartphone.

name: SJCAM SJ8 Pro 12MP 4K Wi-Fi Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera
description: The SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera has a waterproof shell, a touchscreen, and gyro stabilization to capture precise, high-quality film no matter what the situation is, whether you're running, bicycling, flying, driving, or boating. The SONY IMX377 CMOS sensor and Ambarella H22 S85 chipset are housed in a lightweight plastic housing that weighs only a few ounces. The SJ8 Pro shoots 12MP JPEG/raw photographs with a maximum resolution of 4000 x 3000 at 60 frames per second and records MP4 H.264/H.265 video at a maximum quality of 3840 x 2160p at 60 frames per second. It boasts an 8x digital zoom and a 170Â° wide-angle lens that allows for rapid focus and captures a huge field of view.  Time-lapse, picture burst, slow motion, video+photo, and TV modes are among the camera's many features, as are settings for automobile (syncs to the motor with optional connection) and FPV (first-person view) modes. Its 2.33" IPS retina LED back touchscreen gives you access to brightness, color temperature, external mic, frequency, and Wi-Fi options, all of which let you fine-tune your setup. A front OLED LCDs basic information such as timecode, resolution, battery level, and recording mode. On a full charge, the SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera has a 1200mAh battery that lasts about 90 minutes and can be charged via a USB Type-C connection. Because it's detachable, you can buy a spare to use for longer shoots and charge it with a separate battery charger. The SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera records to a microSD card with a maximum capacity of 128GB, and video and photographs may be exported via the USB-C connector. There's a speaker on top and two noise-canceling mics built into the front and sides of the housing, plus you can buy an external mic that plugs into the USB-C port separately. Video start/stop, picture burst, Wi-Fi on/off, photo shutter, and camera on/off may all be controlled using an optional wireless remote, which can be purchased separately. With the free SJCAM Zone app, you can manage the camera's operations, edit and share your photographs and movies from your iOS or Android smartphone. For maximum positioning freedom, the SJ8 comes with several mounting options, bases, and plates, as well as a watertight enclosure for underwater images. A USB Type-C connector, lens cover, and cleaning cloth are all included in the camera box. The SJCAM SJ8 Pro Dual Screen Waterproof Action Camera has no warranty.

name: Sony ZV-E10 24.2MP 4k Touchscreen Vlogging Digital Camera with 16-50mm Lens
description: The Sony ZV-E10 is designed to capture amazing videos of you and your world, without any tricky setup. It makes all skin colors look vibrant, natural and healthy. There's also an optional Soft Skin Effect mode for a smoother look. The Sony ZV-E10's Fast Hybrid AF system lets you simply and quickly switch focus from a face to the background, for more stylistic and watchable videos. By just pushing the Bokeh switch, you can switch background bokeh on and off â€” no need for complex manual adjustments. Now it's easy to simply select a professional-looking defocused background, or keep the entire scene in focus, with just the press of a button. Product Showcase Setting allows you to switch with just a single button press to settings that are perfect for product reviews. It widens the angle of view and switches the focus to the object instantly, so you don't need to wait for the focus to shift or place your hand behind the product to shift the focus to it. The Sony ZV-E10 is built to get great shots while you're moving. With amazing image stabilization, you can shoot smooth video when walking, and as the light goes from shadow to sun or outdoors to in, the automatic exposure (AE) tracks faces and makes sure they always appear well-lit. The Sony ZV-E10 is designed to bring together simplicity and power, opening up creative opportunities as wide as your imagination. There's no longer a need to compromise your images with your smartphone camera just to share content quickly. The vari-angle LCD touchscreen flips out horizontally, making it perfect for selfies and vlogging. Clear of ports, microphones, and mounting shoes, it allows for precise framing and fluid operation even while in front of the camera. Carry professional-quality video along in your pocket, with stunning 4K HDR detail and powerful exposure tools for content guaranteed to impress. Check out the features of the Sony ZV-E10 for vlogging and content creation. The Imaging Edge Webcam application makes it easy to use your Sony camera as a high-quality webcam, with wide compatibility, for impressive live-streaming and conferencing. The Sony ZV-E10 comes with no warranty.

name: Canon EOS 850D DSLR Camera (Body Only)
description: The Canon EOS 850D DSLRCamerais versatile with well-rounded picture and video capabilities, designed for first-time shooters yet capable of complex photographic jobs. With a 24.1MP APS-C-format CMOS sensor and DIGIC 8 image processor, the camera supports high-resolution stills and UHD 4K video recording, as well as a wide ISO 100-25600 sensitivity range for working in a variety of lighting scenarios. The sensor's design facilitates Dual Pixel CMOS AF, which uses phase-detection autofocus for quick, accurate, and smooth focusing performance when recording movies or shooting stills in live view. A 45-point all cross-type phase-detection system is employed for rapid and precise focusing in a range of shooting conditions while shooting stills with the optical viewfinder. The physical design includes a 3.0" 1.04m-dot touchscreen LCD with a vari-angle design that allows for easier reading from high, low, and even front-facing angles. In addition, built-in Wi-Fi with NFC allows for quick and easy connection with a smartphone or tablet for wireless image sharing, and Bluetooth is included for image sharing and remote camera control from a mobile device.

name: Nikon Z50 20.9MP Wi-Fi Mirrorless Digital Camera with 16-50mm Lens
description: NIKON Z50 Mirrorless Digital Camera is a DX-format mirrorless digital camera revolving around the versatile Z Mount. It is Capable in both stills and video realms, the Z50 features a 20.9MP CMOS sensor and EXPEED 6 image processor, which enables fast performance up to 11 fps, a reliable 209-point hybrid AF system with eye detection and notable low-light performance to ISO 51200. For video shooters, UHD 4K is supported up to 30 fps along with Full HD recording at up to 120 fps for slow-motion playback. For fine-tuning your photos and videos, in-camera clip trimming can be used, and 20 Creative Picture Controls and 10 Special Effects settings help to infuse your imagery with a unique look. In this Mirrorless Digital Camera, the DX-format 20.9MP CMOS sensor is paired with the EXPEED 6 image processor to provide a versatile mixture of high sensitivity, nuanced image quality, and fast overall performance. It is also capable of recording more than just stills, the Z50 supports UHD 4K video recording at up to 30 fps and Full HD recording at up to 120 fps, for slow-motion effects, along with the ability to save movie files to the in-camera memory cards or to an optional external recorder via HDMI out. In-camera time-lapse shooting is also possible with the ability to produce a finished UHD 4K video file directly from the camera. A sensitivity range from ISO 100-51200 permits working in a broad array of lighting conditions, and can be further expanded up to ISO 204800 for extreme low-light conditions. This new camera is also featured with APS-C (1.5x Crop Factor) Camera Format, Actual: 21.51 Megapixel, Effective: 20.9 Megapixel, 5568 x 3712 Maximum Resolution, 1:1, 3:2, 16:9 Aspect Ratio. This camera provides JPEG, Raw Image File Format	with 14-Bit and Digital (Video Only). The mixture of resolution and sensor size also contributes to clean image quality and smooth color transitions with reduced noise throughout the sensitivity range. In addition to benefitting image quality, the EXPEED 6 processor also affords a wealth of speed throughout the camera system, including a top full-resolution continuous shooting rate of 11 fps as well as 30 fps shooting at 8MP.

name: Sony a7R IVA 61MP Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only)
description: An upgraded UXGA OLED Tru-Finder EVF with a 5.76m-dot resolution is included, and a dedicated High-quality preset offers a 120 fps refresh rate for extremely smooth playback of moving subjects. In addition to the EVF, a 3.0" 2.36m-dot rear LCD with a touch panel design is provided for simple operation and focusing adjustment. In addition, the screen tilts upward 107° and downward 41° to facilitate working from high and low angles. While staying lightweight, the magnesium alloy chassis ensures stiffness, longevity, and stability. The lens attachment has also been modified to help accommodate heavier lenses, as has the grip stiffness for more comfortable hand-holding. Extensive weather-sealing has been used to withstand dust and moisture for dependable operation in extreme weather situations, including increased sealing around the battery cover, terminal cover, and chassis joints. The a7R IVA's battery life is rated at roughly 530 shots per charge with the EVF or 660 shots with the rear LCD, using the same NP-FZ100 battery as its predecessor. Dual SD memory card slots provide versatile file storage and processing, and may be set to divide raw and JPEG files or to record overflow data. Both of the card slots are rated to support UHS-II memory cards for faster transfer speeds. Integrated PC sync terminal for wired flash sync with strobe packs or wireless radio remotes. A USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port has been added, in addition to a micro-USB port, for faster, more reliable tethering support. The USB Type-C connection allows the camera to be charged from the host power source while connected. Updated Multi Interface Shoe supports working with the optional ECM-B1M Shotgun Microphone or XLR-K3M XLR Adapter Kit, which provide improved, clear audio recording sound by sending a digital audio signal to the camera, opposed to an analog signal. In addition, the a7R IVA has a 3.5mm microphone input connector for use with external microphones. The a7R IVA's built-in Wi-Fi allows it to rapidly transmit imagery to mobile devices for direct sharing online to social networking sites, via email, and cloud storage services. Wireless tethered shooting is also possible with support for both the 2.4 and 5.0 GHz bands. NFC (Near Field Communication) is also available, allowing for a one-touch connection between the camera and compatible mobile devices with no complicated setup. When connected, the linked mobile device may also display a live view image on its screen and activate the shutter of the camera remotely.

name: Sony FX6 Full-Frame Cinema Line Camera (Body Only)
description: The Sony FX6 Full-Frame Cinema Line Camera is built with an Exmore CMOS sensor and a Bionz XR. It delivers fast readout speeds as well as a dynamic range of 15+ stops to deliver superb image quality with wide sensitivity. The full-frame sensor and expanded ISO sensitivity give you the freedom for 4K imagery or low light shooting in a range of settings using a base ISO of 800 as well as an ISO 12800. The FX6 is capable of 4K internal recording, encoding 10-bit depth and 4:2:2 colour sampling with either Full-HD Long-GOP or 4K All Intra compression. You can record right on the camera with the amazing richness of 10-bit depth and 4:2:2 colour sampling, for far greater flexibility in image grading, post-processing and compositing. For demanding post-production workflows, the 16-bit RAW output is available via SDI connection to compatible external recorders while XAVC-I files are simultaneously captured in-camera. The FX6 captures up to 120 frames per second (fps) at the 4K (QFHD) resolution. Slow and Quick (S&Q) modes give you full control over the captured frame rate from 1 to 120fps, allowing precise motion narratives, and up to a beautiful 5x Super Slow Motion (24fps output). Weighing just under 2 lb, the FX6 body is a full 2 lb lighter than the FX9 and measuring 6 x 4.6", it packs a full-frame sensor into a body comparable to the S35-sensor Sony FS5. While the FX6 fits seamlessly into a pro-cine on-set workflow, it also offers several features that are a boon for a single-operator user. A 3.5" High-definition 2.76 million-dot flexible LCD panel that boasts timesaving touchscreen access to key menu settings and versatile positioning for comfortable operating. The Sony FX6 Full-Frame Cinema Line Camera has no warranty.

The Super 35mm CMOS image sensor was specially developed by Canon to offer an important extension to dynamic range. The DGO Sensor is a newly developed imaging system that generates a high dynamic range and maintains low noise levels by reading out each pixel with different gains. It delivers an exceptional high-resolution image with 16+ stops of latitude. It also features an impressive low light capability of up to ISO 102, 400 where the human eye cannot easily see. It supports continuous 4K recording at up to 120fps, in both Cinema RAW Light and XF-AVC. In 2K (crop) mode, frame rates from 12 fps up to 180 fps can also be set for greater creative freedom. It supports 5-axis camera shake correction. Approx. 1,750g lightweight body enables it to be comfortably rigged with gimbals and hand-held rigs, making it ideal for various shooting conditions. It provides 1 sec to 1/2000 depending on frame rate and Shutter Control Mode and has 39 setting options. Canon EOS C300 Mark III Digital Cinema Camera has no warranty

name: FUJIFILM X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only)
description: The FUJIFILM X-T3 is a versatilemirrorless cameradesigned for videographers and action photographers alike, with high-speed performance, more-than-capable images, and multimedia versatility. High-resolution stills and 4K video may be recorded utilizing a newly designed image sensor and processor, while an adept autofocus system provides rapid and precise focusing performance. The sensor, a 26.1MP APS-C-format X-Trans CMOS 4, has a back-illuminated design to improve image quality across the sensitivity range, as well as a large 2.16m-point phase-detection autofocus system for rapid, precise AF performance and subject tracking. The X-Processor 4 complements the imaging and focusing by employing four CPUs for speedier picture processing, as well as continuous shooting at 11 frames per second with a mechanical shutter, 30 frames per second with a 1.25x crop and electronic shutter, and inbuilt 4K60p 10-bit video recording. The X-T3 keeps the classically inspired appearance and prominent tactile controls of previous X-T cameras but adds a revolutionary OLED electronic viewfinder design with a 3.69m-dot resolution and a high 0.75x magnification. This finder offers a high refresh rate of 100 fps for smooth viewing and does not have blackouts when filming at the maximum 30 fps rate. A special Sports Finder Mode may also be employed, which emphasizes the 16.6MP crop area to offer you more room outside of the frame to detect moving things. A rear 3.2" 1.04m-dot LCD monitor, on the other hand, may be utilized for live view shooting and bigger picture playback. The X-T3 also has built-in Bluetooth for wireless sharing and remote control, and the magnesium alloy shell is entirely weather-sealed for working in inclement weather.

If you travel by scooter or work as a delivery driver, the DrivePro 20 is the dashcam for you. The DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam from Transcend is made for motorbikes and scooters. It has Wi-Fi connectivity that allows you to see and download real-time footage on your mobile devices using the DrivePro App. This implies that video evidence may be accessed quickly and easily for reporting occurrences to law police and insurance providers without having to remove the memory card. The Transcend DrivePro 20 Motorcycle Dashcam is a multipurpose device that is small, portable, and simple to set up.
